isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Orifice Tube System, Pre-March 2007 - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500, 8600 - SPECIAL TOOLS - Block Fitting Adapters

svcproc.title: Block Fitting Adapters
svcproc.para: When performing flushing and/or purging operations, adapters are required to connect the service equipment to the HVAC system components (refer to Figure 92). The minimum quantities of each adapter, required to service the HVAC system, are indicated in the figure callout list.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. MALE ADAPTER (1/2 INCH), ZTSE4503 (Minimum Required Quantity: 2)
2. MALE ADAPTER (3/4 INCH), ZTSE4501 (Minimum Required Quantity: 1)
3. FEMALE ADAPTER (1/2 INCH), ZTSE4504 (Minimum Required Quantity: 2)
4. FEMALE ADAPTER (3/4 INCH), ZTSE4502 (Minimum Required Quantity: 2)
